about_the_game:
The Demo

The Demo version of Mulligans Golf Game provides an early look at the core game! While it is a Demo, there is a lot to do and experience. 

The Demo will be available to play from 2/24/2025 until 3/11/2025.

All progress (Saved data) will be usable in the Early Access release version. This includes Legendary Characters data and Course Records.

What is there to do?

The Demo contains all of the following features:

  • Full Tutorial explaining the game mechanics and how to play

  • 11 Legendary Characters with their own golfing skills to play

    • 6 Available at start and 5 Unlockable through gameplay

  • 8 Golf Courses to Play offering a range of difficulties from Easy to Hard

    • 3 Available initially, and 5 more unlockable through gameplay

  • Personal Best scores for each Character for each Golf Course

  • Local Leaderboards maintaining your top 10 scores for each Golf Course

  • Global Leaderboard showing the worlds Top 10 Scores for each Golf Course

  • Handicaps for every Character, showing a rolling average of your last 10 scores and giving you a World Ranking in comparison to everyone else playing the game.

  • Single Player/Local Multiplayer Split Screen (up to 4 Player) 

  • Online Multiplayer (up to 4 Player) - Host or join a game using Room Codes (password protectable)

  • Online Tournament - A Timed event where you play 3 matches on the same course and your Total Net score is your placement in the tournament. This will occur on 3/7/2025 through 3/9/2025.

Golfing

As a player, you are given all the tools you need, but must make the decision on what kind of shot (normal, punch, flop, chip), how to shape it (hook, straight, slice), and how hard to hit it. The game will not tell you any more than recommending a club to use. So lineup and take a few practice swings to determine your plan of attack. Practice swings will update the estimated shot trajectory, allowing you to determine if your current approach is going to work. Then it is up to you to replicate your practice swing once addressing the ball. And if you mess it up, hopefully you have one of your Mulligans available to redo it.

Characters

Step into the world of Mulligans, where the Aliens have come from outer space to figure out how to teach Humans the incredible game of golf. It is a challenging task, but hopefully their disciples (you) are up to the challenge!

Choose from 11 Legendary characters to play with, each with their own set of Golf Skills. Use the Dummy, designed for testing out golf training programs. One of the Stickmen/Women, minions of the Aliens. designed as competitors for the humans to play against. Alien Bob himself, the extra terrestrial leader sent to guide the humans to golfing excellence. Or take on an extra challenge and play as the Caveman or Cavewoman found on Earth, that he must teach how to golf!

Courses

There are 8 Hand Crafted Golf Courses to play, each providing its own challenge! They cover a range of difficulties, allowing you to find the ones that provide a good balance of fun and challenge for your Skills!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 1.80+ Ghz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Mulligans Golf Game is an Arcade Golf Game designed to deliver all the true feelings one gets when golfing with your friends. Climb the leaderboards and challenge your friends in this open map golfing experience!
